CustomField.description: Worker class name that extends CursorBatchWorker. Used by CursorJob for metadata-driven coordinator configuration. Custom coordinator classes define this in code via getWorkerClassName() instead.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Enter the API name of the worker class (e.g., BillingBatchWorker). Required for CursorJob; leave blank for custom coordinator classes.
CustomField.label: Worker Class
